channel.title: Merc and Possessor Relationship (no this isn't a fanfic it's a question about the game's mechanics)
channel.description:
So if the Merc is protecting the possessor. and then the possessor jumps bodies.
Will the merc say oh my target died.
**OR**
Will the merc guard the new possessors body
